name: Partners in deltatime
description:
Man, working as a "data-janitor" is hard work. Do you think you have a good friend to help you?  -Destroy blocks of raw positive and negative data by matching colors! -Uncover data logs of the people who came before you, they Might have something to tell you... -Ruin your friendship! (erh, wait.. don't do that) Controls:

Player 1:
Either WASD QE, or ZQSD AE, since not every gamer has a QWERTY keyboard
Player 2:
The arrow keys.

Credits:

Sound design, Programming and gameplay Ideas: ThisMight
Art and colors: Darkxmoon

Tools used:

Sound effects: Bfxr
Music: Fl studio
Engine: Unit
Art: Aseprite (Any pixel art editor would have worked for this project though.)

Special thanks:

My sanity, for staying with me after this train wreck of a game.

Sidenote: I did what I could for this jam, never enterred one before so I hope it doesn't suck too much.
